per_frame_init_1=step = 0;
per_frame_1=dec_med = pow(0.3, 30/fps);
per_frame_2=dec_slow = pow(0.99, 30/fps);
per_frame_3=beat = max(max(bass,mid), treb);
per_frame_4=avg = avg*dec_slow + beat*(1-dec_slow);
per_frame_5=is_beat = above(beat, -2+avg+peak) * above(time, t0+0.1);
per_frame_6=t0 = is_beat * beat + (1-is_beat)*t0;
per_frame_7=peak = is_beat * beat + (1-is_beat)*peak*dec_med;
per_frame_8=index = (index + is_beat)%16;
per_frame_9=index2 = (index2 + is_beat*bnot(index))%2;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q20 = avg;
per_frame_12=q21 = beat;
per_frame_13=q22 = peak;
per_frame_14=q23 = index;
per_frame_15=q24 = is_beat;
per_frame_16=q26 = bass_att + mid_att + treb_att;
per_frame_17=q27 = index+1;
per_frame_18=q28 = index2;
per_frame_19=q29 = ((index%2)-0.5)*2;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=k1 = is_beat*equal(index%2,0);
per_frame_22=p1 = k1*(p1+1) + (1-k1)*p1;
per_frame_23=p2 = dec_med * p2+(1-dec_med)*p1;
per_frame_24=rot = p2*3.1416/8;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=q1 = cos(rott);
per_frame_27=q2 = sin(rott);
per_frame_28=q3 = -q2;
per_frame_29=q4 = q1;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=//ds = max((q26-0.2),0);
per_frame_32=//step = step + ds/10;
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=step = step + q24;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=p3 = p3*dec_slow + (1-dec_slow) * step;
per_frame_37=q30 = step;
per_frame_38=
per_frame_39=p4 = dec_slow*p4 + (1-dec_slow)*q27;
per_frame_40=q31 = p4;
per_frame_41=
per_frame_42=q12 = time -t0;
per_frame_43=monitor = q12;
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=zoom = 1;
per_frame_46=rot = -0;
per_frame_47=warp = 0;
per_frame_48=dx = 0.00;
per_frame_49=wave_x = wave_x + 0.35*sin(time);
per_frame_50=wave_y = wave_y + 0.35*cos(time*1.21);
per_frame_51=wave_mystery = time/5*sin(q28/q24);
per_frame_52=wave_r = bass;
per_frame_53=wave_g = mid;
per_frame_54=wave_b = treb;
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom - 0.125*sin(q28);
per_pixel_2=rot = rot + 0.125*sin(q28+(time*0.369));
per_pixel_3=dx = dx + q1*sin(time*0.96);
per_pixel_4=dy = dy + q2*cos(time*0.85);
